pullrequest.title: Polaris: raise steering wheel, add collision shapes for roll cage and handles

content.raw:
Speaking of bugs that should be resolved before merging this, these drcsim bugs are related to the vehicle:

* [drcsim issue 124](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issue/124/vehicle-not-deaccelerating)
* [drcsim issue 148](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issue/148/polaris-f-n-r-button-is-missing) (unless it was re-decided to not simulate the f/n/r button)
content.html:
